paper_abstract: Purpose - This paper is the third part of the effort to resolve the following two problems, which urgently need an answer: how can an appropriate theoretical foundation be chosen for modem mathematics and computer science? And, under what interpretations can modem mathematics and the theory of computer science be kept as completely as possible? Design/methodology/approach - The paper is a conceptual discussion of the metatheory. Findings - The paper establishes the metatheory of the logical foundation for the mathematical system of potential infinities. Originality/value - The authors prove the relevant results on the reliability and the completeness of the logical system.
paper_title: Mathematical system of potential infinities (III) - meta theory of logical basis
